trans-unit.source: The instance context that has finished processing.
Represents the method that is called when an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext" /> object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: Представляет метод, который вызывается, когда объект <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext" /> завершает обработку.

trans-unit.source: Use an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> to notify the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] runtime that an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: Используйте объект <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> для уведомления среды выполнения [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] о завершении обработки объектом <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> object notifies the runtime that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> has finished its work, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> once again.
trans-unit.target: Когда объект <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> уведомляет среду выполнения о завершении работы объекта <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback>, среда [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] вызывает метод <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> снова.

trans-unit.source: This cycle continues until <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> returns `true` and the context is closed and recycled.
trans-unit.target: Этот цикл продолжается, пока метод <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> не вернет значение `true`, а контекст не будет закрыт и уничтожен.
